string-array.name: simple_a
string-array.item: Android is mobile operating system developed by Google, based on a modified version of the linux kernel. It was initially developed by Android Inc. which google bought in 2005, Android was unveiled in 2007,with the first commercial Android device launched in September 2008.
Linux Android is based onLinux 3.6 version.

Services Used to perform background functionalities. Intent Used to perform the inter connection between activities and the data passing mechanism. Content provider use to share the data between application.
JAVA Top two layers(application and framework layers are written in JAVA. Where as drivers and library layer are written in C and C++.
Android Debug Bridges.It is acts as bridge between emulator and IDE.
A service is an application component that can perform long running operations in the background.
Intent can be used with startActivity to launch an Activity. It is connected to either the external world of application or intent world of application.
Playing frame after frame using animation-list xml property is called as frame animation.
